property.name: Text
property.value: Add Tidal Memento to your deck. ι After you successfully evade a non-Elite enemy: Seal either 1 [Bless] or [Curse] token from the chaos bag, or any [Bless] or [Curse] tokens revealed from the chaos bag during this test, on that enemy. ε effect: +2. Search the chaos bag for up to 2 [Bless] and/or [Curse] tokens and reveal them, ignoring their effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Deck Size: 30. Trait Choice: At deck creation, choose Blessed or Cursed, or choose both and gain +5 Deck Size. Deckbulding Options: Survivor cards (ξ) level 0–5, Neutral cards level 0–5, cards of your chosen trait(s) 0–5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Wendy's Amulet, Abandoned and Alone, 1 random basic weakness.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wendy Adams deck only. Permanent. ι When an enemy would ready or doom would be placed on it, release a [Bless] or [Curse] token sealed on that enemy: Cancel that effect. ι During a skill test you are performing, when a chaos token would be revealed from the chaos bag: Resolve a [Bless] or [Curse] token sealed on that enemy instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wendy Adams deck only. Advanced. You may play any event in your discard pile as if it were in your hand. Forced – After you play an event or discard an event from play: Place it on the bottom of your deck instead of in your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Advanced. Revelation – Remove all non-weakness cards in your discard pile from the game. If no cards were removed by this effect, shuuffle this card back into your deck. Otherwise, take 3 direct horror.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is half the number of Suspect and Hideout cards in the victory display (rounded up). β: –2 (–4 instead if you are parleying with a Suspect enemy or investigating a Hideout location). γ: –3. If you succeed, look at the top card of the Leads deck. You may choose to shuffle the Leads deck. δ: –1. If you fail, shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the Leads deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: α: –X. X is the number of Suspect and Hideout cards in the victory display. β: –3 (–5 instead if you are parleying with a Suspect enemy or investigating a Hideout location). γ: –4. If you succeed, look at the top card of the Leads deck. You may choose to shuffle the Leads deck. δ: –2. If you fail, shuffle the top card of the encounter deck into the Leads deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced – When this agenda would advance by reaching its doom threshold: Instead, remove all doom in play and shuffle a random set-aside Monster enemy into the Leads deck. Then, if there are no set-aside Monster enemies, advance to agenda 1b.

property.name: Text
property.value: Spawn the set-aside Angry Mob enemy at Innsmouth Square, exhausted. Place 1π clues on each Suspect enemy and Hideout location in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Angry Mob cannot be defeated. ι After Wendy Adams evades Angry Mob: She may discover 1 clue from its location. Each Suspect enemy loses aloof and enters play with +1π clues. Each Hideout location gets +1π clue value.

property.name: Text
property.value: Suspect and Hideout cards cannot be added to the victory dispay except using Mysterious Photo. Forced – If there are no Suspect or Hideout cards in play: Wendy Adams must draw cards from the top of the Leads deck until she draws a Suspect or Hideout card. Objective – Search for Dad using Mysterious Photo. The fewer cards that remain in the Leads deck, the better. If it is empty, advance.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: All I Have Left of Him

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Mysterious Photo: Either take a parley action on a Suspect enemy or flip Mysterious Photo over. θ If there is a Suspect enemy with no clues on it at your location, investigators at your location spend 1π clues, as a group (2π instead if it is agenda 2): "Have you seen my dad?" Add that enemy to the victory display.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: All I Have Left of Him

property.name: Text
property.value: θ Exhaust Mysterious Photo: Either take an investigate action on at a Hideout location or flip Mysterious Photo over. θ If you are at a Hideout location with no clues on it, investigators at that location spend clues, as a group equal to its clue value: "Where is Dad now?" Add that location to the victory display, moving each enemy and investigator there to a connecting location.
